backend/main.mo: Defines data types and initializes in-memory maps for orders, bookings, memberships, loyalty, impact metrics, and admin authorization with core actor scaffolding. Includes parcel comparison logic and various domain models for the backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing admin-route protection and admin dashboard functionality, mapping features to related source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files detailing behavior of hooks, pages, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining earthy OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes and applying global background and text variables.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React root element and main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all app pages, including home, museum, ordering, booking, loyalty, and admin, wrapped in a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, scroll reset, conditional bottom nav, and routing outlet.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Auth gate that checks Internet Identity and admin status, showing loaders, login, or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling and error recovery.
Booking calendar component showing selectable dates and static time slots within a card UI.
frontend/src/components/BookingRequestFo: Booking request form handling date, zone, notes, package customization, and submission via booking mutation with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with icons and highlighting for menu, museum, booking, and loyalty routes.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeLiveCou: Displays live or fallback metric counters with icons, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/InAppNotificatio: Renders a dismissible success-style alert banner with a message and close button.
frontend/src/components/LoyaltyPointsPan: Displays the user's loyalty points balance and transaction history, with login and loading states.
frontend/src/components/LoyaltyRedemptio: Shows available rewards and allows users to redeem points, handling loading, login, and insufficient balance cases.
frontend/src/components/MembershipProfil: Handles membership profile creation and displays existing membership details, including verification and VIP status.
frontend/src/components/OriginMapSection: Displays an origin map and district list, showing details for the selected district including description and farmer photo.
frontend/src/components/PackageCustomize: Allows users to select a base package and optional add-ons, with loading states for package and add-on data.
frontend/src/components/SocialImpactMete: Shows environmental impact metrics in a grid, with loading handling and metric values.
frontend/src/components/VirtualTourSecti: Displays a 360° virtual tour section with selectable zones, showing placeholders when panoramas are unavailable.
frontend/src/data/menuItems.ts: Defines menu item types, menu categories, a static menu list, and helpers for retrieving items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and stored identity management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderStatusPolling: Polls client orders and queue position, computes countdowns, and triggers notifications on status changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, orders, queue data, and artifact content through an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAnalyticsP: Shows admin business metrics with loading and error handling using cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Lists all space bookings and allows admins to update booking status with refetch support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminElectricit: Placeholder panel showing ATS monitoring is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInventoryP: Placeholder panel indicating inventory management features are coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLoyaltyRew: Allows adding new loyalty rewards and displays the list of existing rewards with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLoyaltyVer: Displays membership requests and allows admins to approve or reject them using verification mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMuseumCont: Provides a form to create artifacts and lists existing artifacts with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersQueu: Shows active orders, supports status updates, and handles loading, errors, and manual refresh.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOriginMapP: Allows admins to create districts with metadata and displays existing district data when loaded.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPackagesPa: Enables adding base packages and add-ons while showing existing items with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSocialImpa: Lets admins update environmental impact metrics and displays the current metric values.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for order queue management and analytics.
frontend/src/pages/ArtifactDetailPage.ts: Displays detailed artifact info with audio playback and handles loading or missing artifact states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the landing page with a hero section and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/LoyaltyPage.tsx: Provides tabs for managing membership profile, loyalty points, and reward redemption.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Shows the menu grouped by category and displays real‑time kitchen queue information.
frontend/src/pages/MiniMuseumPage.tsx: Displays artifacts with QR-scan info, map, and impact metrics, fetching data and showing loading states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderStatusPage.tsx: Polls and displays real-time order status with notifications, error handling, and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/SpaceBookingPage.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface for booking the venue and viewing a virtual tour.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove sensitive params from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, features, and pending admin-related requirements for the D'ZETA app.
